title: Demand Type
content:

Demand Type

 

  • Demand Type
    • Filters
    • Creating a Demand Type
    • Editing Demand Type
    • Details View
    • Deleting a Demand Type
      • Field Description

Demand Type enables you to configure combining demand values of multiple metric types together for forecasting. Users can also add more metric type(s) to an existing demand-type after it has been used in setting up a forecast policy. In that case, users will need to re-initialize forecasts for each forecast policy using that demand type.

Demand Types need to be configured prior to creating forecast policies.

Example: Demand Type Id = ‘Ship from Store’

Metric Types include: ‘Next Day Ship’, ‘Two Day Ship’

 

Filters

The demand type filters are:

1) Demand Type Id

2) Description

 

Creating a Demand Type

To create a new demand-type:

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Forecast > Demand Type
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Demand Type window.
  4. On the Demand Type page, enter a unique Demand Type Id of the organization.
  5. Enter the Description of the demand type.
  6. Click Save and continue.
  7. To Add Metric Types, Click Add New. The Metric Type Lookup window opens.
  8. Enter the Metric Type Id and click Search. ‘*’ wildcard can be used to search for all Metric Types.
  9. Select the metric type id and Submit.
  10. Click Save And Finish.

Editing Demand Type

To edit demand-type:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Forecast > Demand Type
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required demand type record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Demand Type window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified demand type details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required demand type record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Demand Type window, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save to save the modified demand type details.

Details View

 

Swipe Out List

  • Select the required demand type record. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Details.
  • In the Demand Type wizard, you can view the details of the demand type.

Details View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the action buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click Details from the action button to view details of demand type.

Deleting a Demand Type

 

The demand type  records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Forecast > Demand Type
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of demand type is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the demand type.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of demand type is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the demand type.
Note: 
1) The user can delete the demand type that is not associated with the forecast policies.
2)  If the user wants to delete the demand type associated with forecast policy, the following validation message will be displayed.
       For example, Demand Type BOPIS is already associated to Forecast Policies {{Forecast policies names}} (DT::116)

 

Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Demand Type Id

The unique demand-type identifier.

Description

The description of the demand type.
Metric Type Id The metric type identifier.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of demand type attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Demand Type window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Demand Type window to edit the records.
Details Opens the relevant Demand Type window to view and edit the records.
